Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2009 11:47AM calf905 wrote: I am going through the same thing  I am so so scared.  I am not as young as I was when I went through other major surgeries.  I am having a mastectomy on 6/29.  I hope I am doing the right thing.  I know it is tough losing a breast but due to my age it isn't as important as it used to be but I still fear the loss.  I shudder to think of the treatment thereafter also.  I am so depressed.  I am up one minute and down the next.
Posts.Title: Kinda scared.... MamaLambNC margiejune
